subject: Football (College)
College Football Playoff National Championship
Coaches and Managers
lead_paragraph: Helfrich brings the humble, hard-working values of his coastal Oregon hometown to his work, where he is known for a lack of ego and for self-deprecating humor about his receding hairline.
snippet: Helfrich brings the humble, hard-working values of his coastal Oregon hometown to his work, where he is known for a lack of ego and for self-deprecating humor about his receding hairline.
